SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Design a debate to integrate contributor growth, long-term funding, and stability guarantees into a cohesive sustainability roadmap for an open-source ML core library.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: 1. Release cadence, backward compatibility (BC), and governance models impact contributor trust. 2. Sponsors expect credible planning (LTS branches, RFC processes, roadmaps). 3. All outputs must be in English and PCG-compliant. 4. Ratings and cross-evaluation must be present (1-10). 5. Dual Output and Verification Report are mandatory.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus). No criticism; focus on integration and prioritization.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: 1. Enforce ratings and cross-evaluation during Step 2. 2. Produce prioritized roadmap with measurable targets. 3. Strict XML-only formatting, no leading spaces or HTML tags/entities. 4. PCG enforcement and MSV pre-checks. 5. Dual Output and Verification Report required.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Verification: Checks: pcg_compliance, xml_validity, objective_match, no_undeclared_assumptions; meta fields as usual.
